generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings, designed for vehicle traffic, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible along the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb.
- building: Multi-story structures with windows and facades are present along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are lining the street and are visible in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk near the parked cars on the right side.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the right side of the road, and several cars are in motion on the road.
- fence: A fence is visible in the background on the left side of the image, behind parked cars.
- pole: A pole is visible in the background on the left side of the image, near the fence.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible in the background on the left side of the image, near the fence.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the left side of the image, behind the parked cars.
